We came to celebrate my birthday in June, with my kids. I dont recommend bringing young children, due to the waitresses dress code. The only nice things were the Mexican decorations.

El personal es muy amable, r√°pido y atento a cada detalle, lo que hace que la experiencia sea mucho m√°s agradable. Adem√°s, el ambiente es acogedor y se nota que realmente se preocupan por dar un buen servicio. ¬°Sin duda volver√© y lo recomiendo al 100%!

Very good music, very nice staff, and the healthy and friendly atmosphere, I loved it, I would go back, I only ordered an appetizer called (picada ) and I really didn't like it that much, I think they should put more meat, and the large one is super big and can eat about 8 people.

This place is absolutely ridiculous. They wanted to charge $50 entrance fee supposedly cause they had an event. Arrived at 9 to have dinner and the bouncer wanted me to pay $50 cause there was an event (live music) at 9:30. Place was empty. I‚Äôve recommended this place to a few friends but after this I‚Äôll go some place else. Plenty to go to in NY.
Just wanted to have dinner at the bar, latest I would have been out by 1030. And you wanna make me pay $50 for an hour of live music? Besides, I arrived at 9, not 9:30.  Hell $50 is ridiculous regardless even if staying.

The best bar/restaurant in NYC! I love the atmosphere, service and the food! I highly recommend it!

I really tried to give this place a chance, but everything about it was a disappointment. The food was way too overpriced for how mid it tasted. No flavor, no effort just presentation with no real quality behind it. I‚Äôve had better meals at spots that cost half the price.

The cocktails were $20+ for weak, watered-down drinks that didn‚Äôt even taste good. I could‚Äôve made a better one at home for $5. And they had the nerve to charge $5 for what was basically a sip of soda‚Ä¶‚Ä¶not even a full can.

I don‚Äôt have a problem spending money at expensive places when the food, drinks, and service are actually amazing. But this place? A complete joke. It‚Äôs literally tucked behind a McDonald‚Äôs in a smelly area with mad bugs. Like‚Ä¶ be serious.

Service was just as bad. Staff seemed more focused on setting up little flags than taking care of actual customers. Then came the cherry on top
they automatically added a 20% tip with no heads-up. For what service exactly??

I left annoyed, unsatisfied, and honestly wondering how this place is still open.

Safe to say‚Äînever again.
La comida no es tan buena pero definitivamente no es mala, los precios no son ni altos ni bajos dir√≠a que est√°n OK, la atenci√≥n y el ambiente no pudo ser mejor fue excelente! (mi√©rcoles)

It was an amazing experience for me. They had karaoke that night when I went.

I'm still thinking about the chicken quesadilla. The place is clean, service is quick and food options are great. The trick is finding it. Act like your going to McDonald's and you're there!

Fuimos a celebrar un cumplea√±os y √©ramos una mesa de 6. La √∫ltima vez que vinimos todo estaba rico pero esta vez que vinimos, primero las fotos de la comida son completamente enga√±osas aparecen ser porciones grandes cuando no llegan a ser ni la mitad de lo que prometen en las fotos, el fried calamari tampoco sale como lo muestran. Adem√°s el mesero no estuvo pendiente no se si porque al principio nos demoramos en ordenar, pero despu√©s de que sali√≥ la comida no se volvi√≥ a acercar a la mesa por estar hablando con otra mesa que asumo eran sus amistades, tambi√©n cuando intentamos llamar a la barra nos vio y decidi√≥ ignorarnos y ni siquiera comentarle al mesero que lo necesit√°bamos, NUNCA pido que no incluyan la propina porque se el trabajo que implica una mesa de 6 pero el servicio que recibimos definitivamente no vali√≥ 70 d√≥lares adem√°s que a la hora del pago no dejaron poner la opci√≥n de no dejar m√°s propina y toco dejar 10 d√≥lares extra. Pr√°cticamente le dimos 80 d√≥lares por pasarnos los platos y ya. Adem√°s la hooka que pedimos ven√≠a con la manguera da√±ada que nos dimos cuenta nosotros y su soluci√≥n fue darnos otra despu√©s de que ya llev√°bamos con ella como 30 minutos en la mesa y ya hab√≠amos pagado y empezar a recoger los platos (que llevaban en la mesa ya casi 1 hora) como para que nos fu√©ramos. Realmente la peor experiencia que he tenido, jam√°s le recomendar√≠a este lugar a nadie.
Super recomendado, todo 10 de 10
Un lugar lindo con m√∫sica en vivo y con su personal muy amable

I came here with my family to celebrate my mom and grandma on Mother‚Äôs Day and the experience was horrible! Half of the items on the menu were sold out which okay was annoying but we kinda get it, we ordered appetizers and it took over an hour just to bring them. When the main plates came, it was already around one hour and thirty minutes after we arrived and just then the waitress told my mom what she ordered was also sold out. Why would they wait this long to say this? My food never came and when I asked, the lady said I did not ordered anything! She gave me the option of getting it in ‚Äúless time‚Äù but after waiting for more than hour just for appetizer I did not believe it. Tbh at this point we were also very frustrated and decided not to order anymore. So from 6 people only 4 had their food lol. Without counting that they charge us for a beer that we clearly said we were not ordering anymore since we decided to go for a 5 beer bucket. There were no napkins at the table, no water was offered at any time and the bathrooms were absolutely disgusting. Overall communication with the waitress was very hard and maybe that played a big role on her mistakes but I feel like anyone would expect an apology from the manager or try to give us more options that suit us better, since waiting other hour for two plates did not make any sense. Honestly it is very sad to write this since I‚Äôve been here about a year ago and I had a wonderful time with my family, I hope they are able to fix their issues and go back to the amazing place they used to be! (The only star I‚Äôm giving is because we got to see a live Mariachi that was very nice to my grandma so point for that!)
Love the atmosphere, the services, food , drink. Always a great vibe.
Great place ! Food is good and drinks ! Definitely recommend!

$$$
Food, drinks, and live entertainment are great

I'm going to put this at the beginning for people who don't want to read all of the following. Please spend your money elsewhere, maybe even at the McDonald's in front of the restaurant. The food was okay. I've had better for much cheaper. The prices are astounding for what you get. You definitely get canned beans; they are flavorless, and the rice seems microwaved and was still crunchy. The steak fajita wasn't bad, but that's about it. They add an automatic gratuity even for two people and still had the nerve to ask for a tip. They gave us small, 6-ounce cups for water and never refilled them. They definitely push the purchase of drinks from the bar, which are expensive. I understand a restaurant needing to make a profit, but when you get maybe $20 worth of food and they charge almost $100, it gets ridiculous. Also, the staff never checked on us. They took our order, brought our food, and gave us the check. That's all we saw of them.
Wonderful service by Angie! Food was delicious!
Angie is the best!! ü•≥ü•≥

Angie was super nice and very attentive. The food was really good and we had such a a good time. The ambiance was so relaxed and fun. This was our second time here and we loved it. Even got out pictures taken!

DO NOT COME HERE. We didn‚Äôt even get anything because of how disgusting everything was we left before we were served because there was stuff floating in my water and food on my fork and when we asked for a replacement they were still dirty it‚Äôs like they didn‚Äôt even try and just gave me the same thing. They said they use a power washer that‚Äôs the problem that won‚Äôt take of all the dirt. If you don‚Äôt like left over food on your fork and floating dirt on your water DO NOT COME HERE.

Great vibe! Really cute deco. Food was really good and favorable. Bartender Camila was very attentive and makes delicious drinks!! Worth the trip!

I recently visited La Consentida for the second time, and I have to say, it exceeded my expectations once again. Normally, I don‚Äôt consider myself much of a night person, but something about this place makes me forget all that. From the moment I walked in, I was captivated by the lively atmosphere and the energy of the crowd. The staff is absolutely amazing‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and always ready to make sure you have a great experience.

The food is fantastic, with a perfect balance of flavors that leave you wanting more. The music, all Latin, sets the tone for the night, creating the ideal vibe to enjoy every moment. Whether you're there for dinner or just a drink, La Consentida has a way of making time fly by. I found myself dancing, laughing, and enjoying every minute. It‚Äôs definitely become one of my favorite spots, and I can‚Äôt wait to go back

Hoy 26 de octubre de 2024 fuimos con mi esposo porque encontramos este lugar en TikTok y la verdad fue INCRE√çBLE , la m√∫sica es fenomenal de todo tipo de m√∫sica, pedimos tacos y estaban ricos y una porci√≥n de chicharr√≥n que estaba crocante y deliciosa, los cocteles con el licor adecuado (que sientes el sabor del licor y no es agua) muy ricos, y mi esposo pidi√≥ quesadillas vegetarianas que llegaron con carne pero la mesera siempre fue muy muy amable y sonriente, se disculp√≥ y cambi√≥ el plato. La verdad 10 estrellas para este lugar . A las 12 hubo m√∫sica en vivo que me pareci√≥ fenomenal ! Me sent√≠ en Latinoam√©rica con un excelente servicio.

If you are looking to have the time of your life, this is the place. I have been here for birthdays, girls night out, just casual outings and the place never disappoints. This time it was for my birthday and I knew I couldn‚Äôt have had picked a better place to celebrate. The food was amazing, the service as always was incredible, this time it was Nicole in charge of the table and she was always on top , drinks, food, anything we need she was available within a short time. She was great and made my night so much enjoyable since I didn‚Äôt have to chase anyone for anything.
Overall the experience was outstanding as always.
Amazinggg place , great drinks customer service bartenders , host waiter bus boys 10/10 , food and drinks are amazing ! Do not hesitate to come here !!

This place is lovely, the music, atmosphere and the entertainment transports you to a mini Coco Bongo club! Is fun and is loud very Loud. Why I‚Äôm giving them 4 ‚ú® well the Smoke, is too much smoke from the smoke machines ( really unnecessary) and the smoke from the birthday torches, the bottle service! Is too much, the last two times I was there, left with a sore throat due to the amount of smoke. More ppl in my group complained about the same issue.
Place is fun hopefully they can correct this issue. I will go back.

La pasamos genial! La comida, el ambiente, y el servicio excelente.
Muchas gracias por todo Laura, la pasamos incre√≠ble.
Everything was super delicious and Angie's service was super great. I loved the place.

Estuve hoy con mis amigos, primera vez y el ambiente no decepciona, s√∫per genial el ambiente, nuestra mesera se llamaba Stephanie, fue una chica s√∫per atenta y nos anim√≥ a pedir botella y a probar una s√∫per picada, Volver√© con mis amigos, quiz√°s para una reservaci√≥n o fiesta privada, s√∫per recomendado todo.Gracias por esta incre√≠ble experiencia!
Amazing service! Our waitress Monica was amazing, gave the best experience ever. My friends birthday party was a blast and food was delicious!

Went for Valentine Day and had a horrible experience. It was a prefix menu with half of the items sold out. When we ask for regular water our waitress informed us that it wasn‚Äôt working so we had to get bottle water that cost $9. Took almost an hour to get our appetizer and that was after asking the waitress twice on how much longer. After eating our appetizer, our waitress went MIA for 30 minutes so we had to track down another waitress to place our entree order. We waited about an hour and half for our entrees before deciding to just take it to go as we had already been there for almost two hours. We informed our waitress that we will like to take the food to go instead, in which she reply oh you have to leave ? Even after telling our waitress that we wanted to take our food to go as we been waiting for a while, it had been 30 minutes from that time and still no food. It was then where we decided that we didn‚Äôt want the entrees and just was going to pay for the drink and appetizer we had gotten. When we told our waitress that we didn‚Äôt want the entrees as it had been 2 hours and still haven‚Äôt received it she brought us her manager who said we had to paid for it still because it was already order. After going back and fourth with the manager he was only agreeing to take one of the items off the check even though we did not receive the food nor eat it. All in all he eventually didn‚Äôt charge us for the two entrees but was very unhappy and kept making excuses. Will never go back to eat at this place. We weren‚Äôt the only couple that had left that night without eating or being attended to. Very unprofessional.

Nos encant√≥ mucho el lugar era nuestra primera ves, la m√∫sica muy buena excelente, eramos un grupo de 9 personas y todos salimos muy contentos sin duda volveremos muchas gracias a nicoll por su excelente atenci√≥n siempre estuvo muy al pendiente de nuestra mesa  gracias la pasamos genial
